metadata.name: Glittering SE #1
metadata.description:
The most notable characteristic of John Cookâ€™s art is that process of making their digital collage varies slightly from work to work. The artist duo, John Cook has worked in collaboration by alternately using photography and oil painting techniques in a single work through digital collage, with themes based on their common interests.
